content.text:
# WME Awards 2025

| network =
| previous = 2024
| main = WME Awards
| next =
}}
The WME Awards 2025 will be held on 17 December 2025, at the BTG Pactual Hall, in São Paulo, Brazil. Powered by Billboard Brasil magazine, the ceremony will recognize women in Brazilian music. Preta Gil will be honored.
Nominees
The nominees were announced on 12 November 2025.
Popular vote
The winners of the following categories will be chosen by fan votes.
{| class="wikitable" style="width="
